content.rendered:
2022 Indianapolis 500 Package Rates

The rates below are based on a package including three nights hotel stay, grandstand tickets on race day, roundtrip transfers on Sunday, plus much more. You can further customize your package with tickets to additional events, ticket upgrades, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades and other add-ons.
Hotel PackagePackages From
TownePlace Suites Indianapolis DowntownSold Out
The Westin Indianapolis$1,875
Conrad Indianapolis DowntownSold Out
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot (50% deposit for Conrad packages). The balance will not be due until three months prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
